scripts.dev:mock: concurrently -n devnet,deploy,web -c blue,green,cyan "bun run devnet" "bun run deploy:wait" "bun run dev:local:wait"
scripts.dev:fork: DEPLOY_ENV=fork concurrently -n devnet,deploy,web -c blue,green,cyan "bun run devnet:fork" "bun run deploy:wait:fork" "bun run dev:local:wait"
scripts.deploy:wait: bun run wait-for-devnet && bun run deploy:all && bun run sync-addresses
scripts.deploy:wait:fork: bun run wait-for-devnet && DEPLOY_ENV=fork bun run deploy:vault && bun run sync-addresses
scripts.wait-for-devnet: bun --cwd packages/scripts run check-devnet || (sleep 2 && bun run wait-for-devnet)
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules packages/contracts/target packages/contracts/deployments
